metadata.fieldPath: root.Allow negative balance for accounts.Allow negative balance for accounts
metadata.tooltip:
If true, players can go into negative balance (debt).
If false, transactions that would cause negative balance are blocked.

Examples: true, false

metadata.fieldPath: root.Balance limit for accounts (0 to disable).Balance limit for accounts (0 to disable)
metadata.tooltip:
Maximum amount a player can have in their account.
Set to 0 to disable the limit (unlimited).
Prevents players from accumulating too much currency.

Examples: 0, 1000000, 10000000

metadata.fieldPath: root.Negative balance limit for accounts (0 to disable).Negative balance limit for accounts (0 to disable)
metadata.tooltip:
Maximum amount a player can have in their account.
Set to 0 to disable the limit (unlimited).
Prevents players from accumulating too much currency.

Examples: 0, 1000000, 10000000

If true, accounts with zero balance that haven't been used are removed.
Helps keep the database clean.

Examples: true, false

metadata.fieldPath: root.Log transactions to file.Log transactions to file
root.Starting account balance (0 or higher).Starting account balance (0 or higher)
metadata.tooltip:
The amount of currency new players start with.
Set to 0 to give players no starting money.
Common values: 1000, 5000, 10000

Examples: 0, 1000, 5000

metadata.fieldPath: root.Wipe balances on new save file.Wipe balances on new save file
metadata.tooltip:
If true, all player balances are reset to starting balance on wipe.
If false, balances persist across wipes.

Examples: true, false
